folder: Pearl Street & Park Row, Manhattan, NY
text:
pearl Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of Park Row, as seen from Park Row with the Second and Third Aves., Elevated in the foreground.

About 1914.

'ASSUMING STREET TO BE EAST AND WEST'
title: Manhattan: Pearl Street - Park Row

folder: Park Row & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
116-120 Park Row, west side, between Pearl and Duane Streets.
April 21, 1917.
Underwood & Underwood
title: Manhattan: Park Row - Pearl Street

folder: Park Row & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
1. Park Row, at, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of Pearl Street. Also shown is Pearl St., south side, west from Park Row. (Park Row is arbitrarily set to run north and south). (Pearl Street, when west of Park Row, proceeds east and west). The view shows the Second and Third Ave., Elevated overhead on Park Row.

September 1, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

2. Park Row & Pearl St., n.w. cor.
P.L. Sperr, photographer
July 19, 1941
title: Manhattan: Park Row - Pearl Street

folder: Park Row & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
1. Park Row, at, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of Pearl Street. Also shown is Pearl St., south side, west from Park Row. (Park Row is arbitrarily set to run north and south). (Pearl Street, when west of Park Row, proceeds east and west). The view shows the Second and Third Ave., Elevated overhead on Park Row.

July 19, 1941
title: Manhattan: Park Row - Pearl Street

folder: Pearl Street & Park Row, Manhattan, NY
text:
(1)
Pearl Street, west from but not including Park Row, to and including Cardinal Place. The 3-story building (No. 466) adjoining
the N.W. corner of Park Row is a frame house.

March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a closer view of No. 466.

1932.

J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.

(3)
Another view showing also the corner building at the Bowery.
October 7, 1930.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

956 F3 Neg. # 3864

title: Manhattan: Pearl Street - Park Row

folder: Pearl Street & Cardinal Place, Manhattan, NY
text:
(1) Pearl Street, west from Cardinal Place, to, but not including Park Street. The view shows the rear of the old Dept., of Health Building, at the S.E. corner of Park Street. September 30, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, at a later date and showing the new Federal Courts Building in the process of construction on the site of the former Board of Health Building. October 8, 1933.

P. L. Sperr.

ASSUMING STREET TO BE EAST AND WEST
